text: I m so tired of living I ve never posted anything on Reddit before  but I feel like this may be the only place I can talk about this with people who understand   I am so tired of living  It feels like every second of every day is mentally and physically exhausting  Compared to most people  my life is not that bad  I m   years old and still live with my dad  but I m healthy  I have a full time job  and a few really good friends  Yet I am still miserable  On the surface  I seem to be very happy  But my few friends and some family know that I struggle with depression anxiety  but I have only talked to one person about ever being suicidal  I know that I can talk to my friends about anything  but I always feel like a burden when I do  Like everyone will be in a good mood  so I don t feel like I can really share these dark feelings urges with them without ruining whatever good time they re currently having  I am tired of always pretending everything is fine  just to avoid bringing anyone else down with me  I don t want to be here anymore  My life feels meaningless  and the only thing that has kept me from ending it is the thought of my friends and family having to deal with my death  That s a really shitty motivation to keep living  I have friends  but no SO  I ve been single for around   years and I desperately crave intimacy  I don t mean sex  I want someone to even just give me a hug sometime  I m so lonely and tired of everything  It feels like everyone in my life would be better off if I were no longer here to burden them  I ve had a really awful week  and it s made everything in my head sort of spiral out of control  I really just needed to get all of this off my chest  hopefully to someone who will listen and understand how I feel  Maybe then I won t feel so helpless and alone

text: Tonight  I make the decision I think tonight  after work  is when the decision shall be made   I have found that my family does not really like me and with a big family event coming up  it would be the perfect time    I have considered the pain it would cause others  but I almost think it would be worth it   Maybe then they would see how much they either miss me  or would go on fine without me   I contribute nothing to this household  sure I am thankful they let me live here still  In college  but I am not happy I have had a plan or sorts in the works for sometime now  and I think about it almost every single day   I have no other place to turn  sharing these thoughts does not make me feel any better   Talking to people just makes me feel guilty and it is really something that I need to overcome by myself If all goes well  I will leave tonight and go on an adventure of sorts   The destination being end   I have had those days in which I say  I will wait   hours  and have  but the next day is never any better than the day before   It is the same old same old and life has become pointless   Go to class  get a degree  work some more  Been working part time for the last four years  go to job A  job B  sleep  repeat   After college the outlook is even worse  go to cubicle  stair at grey walls all day  sleep  repeat   That is not the life I want to live but it is one I need to live to get by    Late tonight  I buy a pack of smokes  write a note  get in my car  and drive
summary: After work tonight after work, I will decide whether to leave my family and go on an adventure. My family doesn't like me. I contribute nothing to the household. I have been working part time for the last four years. I am in college.
cleaned: work tonight work decide leave family adventure family not like contribute household work time year college
